page.title: 19Preston-the derelict docks
page.content: In the south of the area is the River Ribble which forms the Borough Constituency Boundary of Preston. South of that is Penwortham Golf Course and its clubhouse. Finally,in the extreme north,is a small area of terraced,early 19th.century housing. To the west is the smaller,outer dock basin which has been drained while repair work on the dock gates is been done,leaving silt and a growing number of weeds behind. Like most other buildings on the dock estate,an old sand quarry is being flattened out for redevelopment. There are plans to develop the dock area and create housing,industry, shopping and leisure facilities.
